keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.PART

Class Classification

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.PART.Classification

  • public class Classification
extends java.lang.Object

    Class to handle a classification of class values.

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Cristóbal Romero Morales (University of Oviedo) 01/07/2008, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 03/12/2008
